meanings.sent1: The panegyrical words of the speaker filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: Her panegyrical review of the movie made everyone want to watch it.
meanings.sent3: The panegyrical compliments from the cat to the dog were quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The panegyrical sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The panegyrical performance left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: A speech or piece of writing that praises someone or something highly.
meanings.sent1: The panegyrical at the award ceremony moved everyone to tears.
meanings.sent2: Reading the panegyrical about her achievements made her feel proud.
meanings.sent3: The panegyrical about the new sandwich at the cafe was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His panegyrical was a beacon of hope in the dark times.
meanings.sent5: The panegyrical of the hero's bravery echoed through the town.
